properties.displayName: Potentially Suspicious Event Viewer Child Process
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\eventvwr.exe" and (not((FolderPath endswith ":\\Windows\\System32\\mmc.exe" or FolderPath endswith ":\\Windows\\System32\\WerFault.exe" or FolderPath endswith ":\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\WerFault.exe")))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects uncommon or suspicious child processes of "eventvwr.exe" which might indicate a UAC bypass attempt
